trans-unit.source: Specifies the Speech Synthesis Markup Language (SSML) action to be taken in rendering a given <xref uid="langword_csharp_TextFragment" name="TextFragment" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Angir handlingen som tale syntese Markup Language (SSML) som må tas med i gjengivelse av en gitt <xref uid="langword_csharp_TextFragment" name="TextFragment" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: TtsEngineAction represents requests for servicing a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.
trans-unit.target: TtsEngineAction representerer forespørsler for å betjene <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>

trans-unit.source: The actions correspond closely to elements in the SSML specification and are implemented on the text returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A> property on a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.
trans-unit.target: Handlingene som tilsvarer nært elementene spesifikasjonen SSML og er implementert på teksten ble returnert av <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A>egenskapen <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A>

trans-unit.source: The TtsEngineAction value associated with a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> is returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: TtsEngineAction-verdi som er knyttet til en <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>returneres av den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>

trans-unit.source: Processing of the TtsEngineAction value returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property is handled by a speech synthesizes implementation of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A> method on a class derived from <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>.
trans-unit.target: Behandling av TtsEngineAction-verdien som returneres av den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A>egenskapen behandles av en tale Syntetiserer implementeringen av <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>metode på en klasse som er avledet fra <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: Indicates that <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"></xref> is to be used as the contents of a bookmark.
trans-unit.target: Angir at <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"> </xref> skal brukes som innholdet i et bokmerke.

trans-unit.source: Corresponds to the `<mark>` XML tag in the SSML specification.
trans-unit.target: Samsvarer med den `<mark>` XML-koden i SSML-spesifikasjonen.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that no action has been determined from SSML input.
trans-unit.target: Angir at ingen handling er fastsatt SSML inndata.

trans-unit.source: The associated <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> is an unknown XML tag not part of the SSML standard.
trans-unit.target: Den tilknyttede <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>er en ukjent XML-koden ikke en del av SSML-standard.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>

trans-unit.source: This input that may be interpreted or ignored by at the discretion of a synthesis engine.
trans-unit.target: Inndataene som kan tolkes eller ignoreres av i overensstemmelse med en syntese-motor.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Requests that input <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"></xref> text be interpreted as phonemes.
trans-unit.target: Forespørsler som inndata <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"> </xref> teksten tolkes som en fonemer.

trans-unit.source: Exact pronunciation is specified by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Phoneme%2A> member of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> object returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property on <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances.
trans-unit.target: Nøyaktige uttale er angitt i den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Phoneme%2A>medlem av den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>objektet som ble returnert av den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A>egenskapen for <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>forekomster.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Phoneme%2A>

trans-unit.source: Corresponds to the `<Phoneme>` XML tag in the SSML specification.
trans-unit.target: Samsvarer med den `<Phoneme>` XML-koden i SSML-spesifikasjonen.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that a <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"></xref> contains no text to be rendered as speech.
trans-unit.target: Angir at en <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"> </xref> inneholder ingen tekst som skal gjengis som tale.

trans-unit.source: Duration of the silence is specified by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Duration%2A> member of the he <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> object returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property on <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances.
trans-unit.target: Varighet i stillhet er angitt i den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Duration%2A>medlem av he <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>objektet som ble returnert av den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A>egenskapen for <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>forekomster.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Duration%2A>

trans-unit.source: Corresponds to the `<Silence>` XML tag in the SSML specification.
trans-unit.target: Samsvarer med den `<Silence>` XML-koden i SSML-spesifikasjonen.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Requests that the associated <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"></xref> should be processed and spoken.
trans-unit.target: Forespørsler som den tilknyttede <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"> </xref> skal behandles og talte.

trans-unit.source: This is the default value of TtsEngineAction for a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, Corresponds to the `<speak>` XML tag in the SSML specification
trans-unit.target: Dette er standardverdien for TtsEngineAction for en <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, samsvarer med den `<speak>` XML-koden i SSML-spesifikasjonen</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that text values provided by a <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"></xref> through its <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak*> property are to be synthesize as individual characters.
trans-unit.target: Angir at tekstverdier som er angitt av en <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"> </xref> via den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak*>egenskapen som skal sammenfatte som enkelttegn.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak*>

trans-unit.source: This rendering includes punctuation, other than white space, as well as alphanumeric text.
trans-unit.target: Denne gjengivelse inneholder tegnsetting enn mellomrom, i tillegg til alfanumerisk tekst.

trans-unit.source: For example thee associated text fragment "word!"
trans-unit.target: For eksempel tilhørende thee tekstfragment "word!"

trans-unit.source: should be synthsized into "w o r d exclamation point".
trans-unit.target: må være synthsized til "w o r d utropstegn".

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Indicates state of paragraph.
trans-unit.target: Angir tilstanden for avsnittet.

trans-unit.source:
Corresponds to the `

` XML tag in the SSML specification
trans-unit.target:
Samsvarer med den `

` XML-koden i SSML-spesifikasjonen

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Indicates start of sentence.
trans-unit.target: Angir starten av setningen.

trans-unit.source: Corresponds to the `<s>` XML tag in the SSML specification
trans-unit.target: Samsvarer med den `<s>` XML-koden i SSML-spesifikasjonen

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.
